description: Yuri has become engaged to Tabuki and the two have decided to move into a new apartment - which Ringo only finds out when she finds herself in Tabuki`s empty old house. But she does find the change of address notice that Tabuki gave to Shoma, and decides that she can still make her destiny come true. Meanwhile, Kanba decides that if Shoma fails to get the diary soon, he is going to take it from Ringo by force.

titles.title: Anche se il tuo amore è una bugia, io...
Even If Your Love Is a Lie...
Kimi no Koi ga Uso demo Boku wa
Même si cet amour est factice, je...
